listing.listing_description:
Get close to the beaches, restaurants, bars and more in Seminyak at Villa Kipi. From this Bali vacation rental in the Batu Belig neighborhood, it’s walking distance to Seminyak Beach and a short drive to some of the area’s best-known beach clubs. The villa’s attentive staff and four bedrooms are ready to welcome up to eight friends or a group of family with the island’s signature hospitality.

This luxury property is laid out around a private courtyard with a swimming pool, al-fresco lounging and dining areas, and a barbecue. It also features a smart TV, sound system and Wi-Fi, plus a security system. Your holiday here starts with welcome refreshments and includes daily American breakfast, plus the services of a cook, property manager, housekeeper and nighttime security guard.

From its leafy gardens to high-ceilinged, open-concept living areas, Villa Kipi has all the elements of classic Bali charm. Fold-away glass doors lead from the pool terrace into the airy living and dining room. While cook service is included in your stay, there is a kitchen just off the great room that’s fully equipped and brightened by clerestory windows.

Each of the villa’s four bedrooms is a honeymoon-worthy retreat with a king bed and en-suite bathroom. The master suite opens to its own private balcony, and the other three bedrooms have outdoor showers and open to the pool terrace.

Villa Kipi is less than a quarter-mile from Batubelig Beach, where surfers can catch a break and everyone else can take a stroll on the sand, and a half mile from La Laguna restaurant and bar. Rent a scooter to pop over to the popular Finns Recreation Club or Tropicola Beach Club, or arrange to hire a driver to take you into Seminyak or Kuta for shopping, dining and nightlife.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note that there is construction near the villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.

Gaze out on panoramic views of Middle Harbour and walk minutes to Balmoral Beach from this contemporary villa in Mosman. Ideal for families and large groups of friends, the villa features multiple lounge and dining areas, an outdoor pool and hot tub, and superb amenities for cooking, wellness, and fun. Mosman Village is just a short walk away, and Sydney Harbour Bridge about 10 minutes by car.

The 3-level home maximizes its harbour-view vantage and offers a variety of spaces for dining and relaxation. Savor an Australian wine by the fireplace or play a favorite tune on the piano. Warm your body in the gym, sauna, and hot tub before plunging into the pool. Then make the most of the gourmet kitchen and 4 barbecue grills to conjure up an unforgettable alfresco feast. The entire upper floor belongs to the master suite and adjoining office, opening to a private balcony with sensational vistas. 

The villa’s prime location within the coveted enclave of Mosman opens up a world of possibilities. Stroll into town for some delicious coffee and breakfast before a trip to Balmoral Beach. Hop in the car to make the rounds of the famous Northern Beaches, including Clontarf, Castle Rock, and Manly. Take the family to nearby Taronga Zoo, or cross the Sydney Harbour Bridge to the iconic Opera House and the Royal Botanic Gardens.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Play in the surf at Belongil Beach and stroll back for alfresco meals from the grill and nighttime dips in your private pool. Part of a complex of 6 new beach villas, Kaylani Cove balances prime location with homestyle comforts including a gourmet kitchen and contemporary media technology. Walk 10 minutes for dinner on Byron Bay town, or explore the edge-of-the-world landscapes of Arakwal Park.

The villa’s pool terrace and deck are cloistered amid walls of natural wood paneling, forming a serene sanctuary for private enjoyments. Lounge chairs accompany the plunge pool in the sun, while the shaded deck includes a dining table and high-end barbecue.

Sliding glass doors create a breezy flow into the open-concept great room, where the spacious lounge welcomes downtime by the large-screen smart TV, or festive late-nights over bottles of Australian wine. The fully equipped kitchen serves a breakfast bar and second dining table, whose smooth wood surfaces invites locally sourced delicacies from New South Wales. Central air conditioning and heating keep you comfortable at all times.

Kaylani Cove includes 2 large suites with king beds and ensuite bathrooms, and 2 guestrooms that share a bathroom and lounge area. The twin beds in one of the guestrooms can be combined into a split-king, and there are 2 additional twin-size beds in the overflow room. All of the rooms have air conditioning and ceiling fans.

The villa's location brings together the varied delights of Australia’s easternmost edge, from the pubs and restaurants of Byron Bay, to the sands of Belongil and Tallow Beach, to the pristine shores of Arawkwal or Cape Byron State Conservation Area—all within four to ten minutes of your door.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved

listing.listing_description:
This architectural gem is nestled on the shores of Lake Wakatipu, on the South Island of New Zealand, close to the ski resorts at Coronet Peak and The Remarkables. The modernist design maximizes the villa's privileged position, with breathtaking mountain views in virtually every living area and bedroom, expansive outdoor spaces (including a superb rooftop terrace), and a beautiful water feature inspired by Frank Lloyd Wright's Fallingwater house. Exceptional amenities for wellness and relaxation include a sauna, outdoor hot tub, gym, and two gourmet kitchens (indoor and outdoor). Air conditioning, heating, a home office, and an elevator create a comfortable environment for guests of all ages. The four bedrooms at Cascata—all with outdoor living areas—accommodate families and groups of friends up to eight in size.

Multiple outdoor living spaces invite you to savor the alpine air and spectacular views. On the main level, the open-concept living and dining area open to a lake-facing terrace and an alfresco dining patio, featuring a barbeque grill, rustic pizza oven, cocktail lounge, and table for twelve beneath a pergola. The hot tub is perched on the ground floor, while the extraordinary roof terrace features a lounge, with panoramic views encompassing Cecil Peak, The Remarkables, Kelvin Heights Golf Course, and the lake.

Wall-to-wall glass doors infuse the interiors with natural light and lake-fresh breezes. The beautifully furnished lounge with high-end entertainment system flows gracefully into the dining area, where the open kitchen features chef-grade appliances and a wide breakfast bar. The villa also includes a superb home office and gym (both with inspiring views), as well as a cozy home theater. A cutting-edge LED lighting system evokes an enchanting ambiance at night.

The master suite features a king bed, private balcony with breathtaking views, and ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, open shower, and lovely soaking tub. The second and third bedrooms share a balcony between them, as well as a deluxe bathroom. The fourth room, with king bed, opens to a terrace and shares a bathroom with the gym.

Beyond this lakeside sanctuary, you're just three kilometers from SKYCITY Queenstown Casino, and within easy reach of Wakatipu Yacht Club, Queenstown Golf Course, and some of the finest skiing and hiking in New Zealand.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Choose your own adventure at The Residence. Whether you’ve come for a romantic getaway, a family holiday or to mark a special occasion with friends, this lavish vacation rental, part of Vomo Island Resort, delivers an experience you’ll remember for a lifetime. Forget about the everyday and let the warm Fijian waters, white sands and friendly staff on this luxury private island pamper you.

Your stay on Vomo Island includes all meals and non-alcoholic beverages, butler service, and the use of sailboats, kayaks, stand-up paddleboards, a gym, tennis courts and more. The Residence itself is tucked into lush tropical gardens right on the island’s Yasawa beach, and has its own outdoor living and dining areas with a pool, barbecue and plenty of loungers facing the brilliant blue water.

The villa’s dreamy modern interiors are spread out over three pavilions for guests’ privacy and comfort. Lofty ceilings, wood paneling and sleek furnishings feel both breezy and sophisticated. In the main pavilion, living and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen have space for everyone to share stories about the day’s snorkeling, tennis matches or spa treatments, or to simply unwind in front of the TV and share photos via Wi-Fi.

All four bedrooms at The Residence have king beds, en-suite bathrooms, their own lounge areas and ocean views, and open to private terraces. Details like wood paneling and mid-century-inspired furnishings are warm and welcoming, while wall-to-wall sliding glass doors showcase the incredible scenery.

With only one resort on Vomo Island, guests are free to explore the 225 acres ringed by white-sand beaches and clear, relatively calm waters. Join the daily guided snorkeling expedition, take kids to make new friends at the children’s center, and get a glimpse into traditional Fijian culture at the manager’s cocktail event on Thursday evenings. If the private island isn’t quite secluded enough, book a honeymoon-worthy day on the uninhabited neighboring island of Vomo Lailai, where resort staff will leave you with a picnic, ample champagne and a radio to call the boat back.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Bring the boat north from Sidney to a waterway home in Palm Beach where deep blue waters beckon you to heel and tack. The large two-story stone house sits facing the beach where the sun streams into spacious, comfortable rooms. Earthy décor, rough bleached stone, and 2 huge balconies take center place for alfresco dining, lounging, and water activity watching. The house is near Ku-ring-gai Chase national park, and is part of the northern beaches peninsula.  

Everyone gets up early for the fishing, boating, kayaking, and sailing where being on the water is what Pittwater is all about. A slice of golden sandy beach abuts Pittwater’s garden so you can pull up lawn chairs and grab binoculars to get a more intimate view of the active bustling waterway. After a full day, everyone can settle in with state-of-the-art digital streaming, a cozy fire in the fireplace, and the nightly debate over which movie to watch, while snacks and drinks are being prepared. 

Golfing is just a walk to Palm Beach Golf Club, it’s 6 minutes to Avalon Golf course, Mona Vale Golf course 12km. History buffs will want to visit the Barrenjoey Lighthouse on the eastern headland. Built in 1881 and sitting on the northernmost seaside promontory. Bring a camera as  it has spectacular panoramic views and is only 5 minutes away.

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Keep warm in the hot tub while you gaze upon the snow-covered peaks of Mt. Aspiring at this modern mountain home, just off Lake Wanaka. Slide open the terrace doors and invite the fresh breeze, fragrant gardens, and warm New Zealand sun to flow through. Spend a romantic evening by the fireplace while the kids play upstairs in the TV lounge or head out to explore Wanaka's town centre.

Westland’s barn-style roof hints at the rugged nature of the Lake Wanaka area, yet underneath, stylish design sets a modern, luxurious tone. Craft delicious meals in the state of the kitchen. Celebrate as a family at the formal dining table with mountain views providing the background. After dinner, sneak away for a glass of local wine in the outdoor lounge as the sun sets behind the imposing mountains.

Start your day bright and early with an espresso on the terrace. Then, whip up some bacon and eggs for the gang to enjoy in Westland’s cozy breakfast nook. Throw a log in the fireplace and catch up on reading while the kids play on the lawn. For lunch, grab something fresh from the local market in Wanaka and fire up the grill. Then head out to the trails for an afternoon hike along the lakeside. 

Rent some mountain bikes, pack a lunch, and make sure to bring your camera. Deans Bank, Rob Roy Glacier, and Roys Peak are all great hiking/biking trails to discover. If you’d rather explore the water, try fly fishing at Aspiring Fly Fishing guides or go jet-boating on the Matukituki River. When you’re ready to return to civilization, Queenstown is just an hour south.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Escape to the forests of Bali in luxury style at Villa Bayad Estate. Though it’s tucked into lush rice terraces, with views of the island’s sacred volcano, this Ubud vacation rental boasts design by a renowned architect and a full staff. Laid out as a compound, the four-bedroom property can accommodate up to eight friends or extended family in a combination of common and private spaces.

Your holiday at Villa Bayad includes an airport transfer, daily breakfast, a twice-daily shuttle to Ubud and the services of a housekeeper and butler. Settle into the striking pool and watch the sun move across the vibrant landscape, indulge in a nap in one of the sun loungers on the terrace and finish the day with a meal from the barbecue at the al-fresco table. The villa also has amenities from an exercise room to a cable TV, sound system and Wi-Fi.

Designed by Popo Danes, one of the most renowned architects in Southeast Asia, the villa is a stunning take on traditional Balinese style. In the main pavilion, a thatched roof, open-plan layout and several sets of French doors to the terrace lend a relaxed feel. The wicker seating area, dining table for ten and fully equipped kitchen are understated yet inviting.

Flower-covered pergolas connect the four bedrooms to the main house. All four suites are honeymoon-worthy retreats with king beds and en-suite bathrooms; two of the bedrooms connect to the villa’s spa area, and two have their own al-fresco showers.

From Villa Bayad Estate, it’s easy to visit the must-sees of Ubud, from its art museums to the market and royal palace. Animal lovers won’t want to miss a visit to the nearby Taro Elephant Safari Park or Bali Bird Park. For those craving sun and sand, popular beaches such as Echo and Kuta are within day-trip distance.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Modern, angular architecture stands out against an endless sky at this laid-back, waterfront property. The resort-style villa is located on the Mornington Peninsula and features glittering water views from each room. Dense shrubbery has been planted along the perimeter to give a natural sense of privacy. Enjoy the fresh ocean air from your private jetty where you can also keep various water toys.

The ultra contemporary interior features metallic accents, polished hardwood floors, and expansive glass walls. Floor-to-ceiling white lacquer cabinets create a clean, minimal appearance in the open-concept kitchen. Secure your spot on the patio’s plump wicker couch and bronze under the golden rays. Sliding doors open onto the deck and alfresco dining area, allowing the living space to seamlessly flow together. 

Safety Beach, in Melbourne’s bayside suburb, is known for its picturesque coves and stretching shorelines. Head out for a scenic drive along the coast, visit a vineyard, peruse local markets, or cycle along a seaside bike trail. Manicured landscaping at Crown Cove provides a verdant backdrop for afternoon happy hour on the tucked away terrace. The cinema room is a great spot to relax with a favourite family film after a long day of exploring—just don’t forget the popcorn. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Feel the sub-tropical breeze wash over you while gazing upon vast countryside views of Myocum at this airy, coastal home. Spend lazy afternoons reading beneath the shade of a palm tree, and keep cool in the saltwater pool. Watch as the sun sets during an alfresco dinner. Then, hop in the car and head 12-km to downtown Byron Bay for a night of dancing, and cocktails at a beachfront bar.  

Hamptonesque design and decor elements borrowed from minimalism create a bright and modern space to contrast with Australia’s vibrant environment. Let the clutter-free interior set your mind at ease. Focus on the views, the fresh air, and the natural sunlight that flows through Aja. Take it to the next level with a soothing bath in the alfresco tub.  

Open all the terrace doors, and Aja becomes one big social setting. Gather the group for a barbecue and mingle in the main lounge. You’ll also find several smaller enclaves if you’d like to sneak away for more intimate moments. On quieter evenings, pick a movie on the streaming television and relax with family. And, if there’s any work that can’t wait, the office space has the privacy you’ll need to get it out of the way.  

Explore the hiking trails of Tyagarah Nature Reserve, and you’ll find scenic settings for a picnic, secluded swimming areas, and fishing spots. When you emerge from the wilderness, head to downtown Byron Bay for shopping, dining, and exciting nightlife. Main Beach is known for its delicious seafood and beachfront bars. Craving even more city life? Plan a day trip north to Gold Coast.  

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Indulge in the ultimate villa experience at Villa Abakoi: a luxury property that offers both a quiet, private setting and a location close to the best of Seminyak. This traditional estate is tucked into a tranquil garden but is just off Jalan Drupadi, close to dining, shopping and your choice of beaches. Reserve this six-bedroom vacation rental for a getaway with family and friends, or with its sister property, Villa Tangram, for a special celebration or even a Bali destination wedding.

Your holiday at Villa Abakoi includes a transfer from the airport, daily breakfast, housekeeping and more; the villa manager can help arrange additional services such as a masseuse or babysitter. With the details taken care of, make the most of the tropical weather on the terrace around the pool, dotted with loungers, and finish the evening with a meal from the shared barbecue.

The villa’s main living areas are in a traditional pavilion, open sides and warm wooden floors. Rattan sofas and dining chairs create a casual, inviting feel, while Balinese artifacts and artwork incorporate vibrant color and personality. The modern kitchen is at the end of the open-concept living space and is fully equipped.

Each of the six bedrooms at Villa Abakoi has an en-suite bathroom. The property has one bedroom with a king bed, three bedrooms with queen beds, one bedroom with two twin beds and one bedroom with two twin-over-double bunk beds.

From the villa’s setting in Seminyak, it’s easy to walk to the famed “eat street” of Oberoi, tempting boutiques and chic beach clubs. Nearby beaches such as Seminyak, Petitenget and Batu Belig are picturesque and calm—the perfect setting for a honeymoon-style stroll along the sand or playing in the waves with the kids.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located along the shores Watson’s Bay, in the exclusive Vaucluse neighborhood of Sydney, this incredible four bedroom is the perfect home base for an amazing summer getaway. From Villa Watson’s Bay, you’ll have incredible views of the bustling bay, as well as private waterfront access via a small sitting area at the base of the property. Within two minute’s walk, you can visit the sandy shores of Gibson’s and Kutti beaches. And, you’ll be located within twenty kilometers of Sydney’s most popular attractions, including the Opera House, Harbour Bridge, and Taronga Zoo.

Utilizing its hillside location, this villa captures dynamic views from four different outdoor decks, and the majority of its interior spaces as well. The decor is beach-chic, with contemporary designer furniture, stone accents, and an exciting collection of modern art. In the living room, you’ll find cozy furniture placed around an imposing fireplace. Only the finest appliances, electronics, and fixtures are used in the kitchen, four bedrooms, and three-and-a-half bathrooms. And, the master bedroom features a king sized bed, a walk-in closet, and ensuite with dual vanity and a rain shower, and there’s a balcony with views of Sydney Harbour and Watson’s Bay.

Villa Watson’s Bay comes with a dry sauna, home gym, and an exciting games room that features a ping pong table, pool table, and wet bar. On the terrace, you’ll love the view from multiple lounge areas and sun chairs. At dinner, there are formal and alfresco dining areas, both seating for eight. And, the villa comes with Apple TV, Wi-Fi, an integrated sound system, and air conditioning.

After you’ve spent a day or two on Gibson’s and Kutti beach, head into town and visit one of the country’s, and World’s, most popular beach areas, six kilometers away at Bondi Beach. For dinner, drinks, and nightlife, the neighborhood in the shadows of the Opera house, The Rocks, is Sydney’s entertainment capital.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Reach the next level of comfort with this excellent group option at one of the Hawaii’s very finest hotels. Complete with a fantastic view of the Pacific, unparalleled access to the neighborhood’s famous beaches, close proximity to the shopping options of downtown Honolulu, plus a huge range of land and sea outings on your doorstep, this spacious suite is as welcoming as it is convenient.

The Ritz Calton will be the kind of home-away-from-home that you will truly come to love, with a huge range of options and amenities waiting for guests. Begin the day with a workout in the fully-equipped gym, or take a dip in the blue brilliance of the rooftop pool, as the warm breeze blows in from Malama Bay. Next, take breakfast in the renowned Market restaurant, where local twists on classic dishes are served as morning light pours through the windows. Taste a delicious coffee in the expansive exterior concourse, and plan your next move as the sun sparkles on the sea in the distance.   

Indeed, the range of activities await those staying at the Ritz Carlton’s suites can be dizzying. Take a tour of the historic war memorials at Pearl Harbour, or dive beneath the waves with a scuba diving or sea scooter outing. Make your way to the southeast of the island to bath in the turquoise waters of Hanauma Bay, one of the most popular destinations in the entire island chain, or blast off for an amazing birds-eye view of the island with an exhilarating helicopter tour. With a packed day behind you, enjoy a cool drink on one of the many beachside bars at Waikiki Beach, or simply take in the fiery Pacific sunset from the air-conditioned comfort of your immaculately-furnished suite.  

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Kambala enjoys an elevated location in the upscale neighborhood of Bellevue Hill, east of downtown Sydney, with expansive views of the city and harbor. Elegant and spacious interiors feature stylish décor and state-of-the-art amenities for cooking and entertainment, while ample alfresco living areas include a swimming pool. With four bedrooms sleeping eight, along with a baby-friendly nursery, the villa is an ideal vacation rental for families and groups of friends who desire a fine balance of privacy and convenience near the heart of Australia's most iconic city.

The villa's yard and pool area invite you to long hours under the Pacific sun and stars. The lush lawn is ideal for reading a favorite book and sipping afternoon refreshments, while the glassed-in pool invites you to soothing dips. A covered lanai with spacious lounge is perfect for afternoon cocktails.

Tall French doors open from the yard to the villa's open-concept interior, where a fully equipped kitchen serves a twelve-person dining table and bright lounge. Luminous white finishes and hardwood floors accentuate the exquisite light, while fine artwork adds touches of chic elegance. Beside the main living area, a comfy den with TV opens to the lawn and lanai.

The villa's bedrooms are furnished with graceful simplicity and a palette of white and soothing gray, providing serene sanctuary for all guests. The master suite features a king bed and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone tub and shower, while the primary guest room has a queen bed and ensuite bathroom. The other two rooms-one with twin bed, one with double-share a bathroom. The crib in the nursery can be replaced by a twin bed for extra guests.

The villa's location offers an excellent blend of privacy and convenience, with Plumer Road Shopping Village within walking distance or a quick drive, and numerous downtown destinations within minutes of your door, including the Royal Botanic Gardens and Sydney Opera House. The beaches at Bondi, Coogee, and Tamarama are all a short drive away, as are Woollahra Golf Club and The Royal Sydney Golf Club. With Sydney Airport less than twelve kilometers away, Kambala is an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Hill 4102 is a spectacular two-bedroom luxury villa, which is within walking distance of the Four Seasons Resort Hualalai, truly one of the world’s great resorts.

Envelop yourself in the soothing sounds of the gentle waves on the shoreline as you relax and unwind in this exceptional ground floor Hill Villa. Push open the receding glass pocket doors and head out to your spacious lanai to make the most of Hawaii’s indoor/outdoor lifestyle. Hualalai truly is a premier destination and what sets this villa apart is its central location and refurbished style. The home has been recently extensively upgraded with designer furnishings, a state-of-the art entertainment center, HD flat-screen televisions in all rooms and a fully equipped gourmet kitchen and barbecue area, stocked and updated with the latest appliances.  Enjoy private dining from the lanai while watching brilliant Big Island sunsets – and if you don't feel like cooking one night a chef service can easily be arranged for you to prepare personalized meals in your villa. Alternatively visit the Oceanfront Resident's Beach House, a favorite among homeowners and resort guests (try the "Big Daddy" Mai Tai and Garlic Fries) - a pleasurable 5-minute beachfront walk from your villa.

Your luxurious master bedroom features a private, outdoor garden shower to complete your Hawaiian experience. The master bedroom features a king size bed, television and ceiling fan. Its gorgeous ensuite bathroom boasts a shower and bathtub as well as the private garden shower. The second bedroom is equipped with two twin beds and a television and is cooled by a ceiling fan.

Take a leisurely stroll to many of the Resort's fine amenities: The Sports Club & Spa, Hualalai Golf Club or the beach at the Four Seasons. Choose from five swimming pools, several stores, four restaurants, and the local-style Trading Company and the Hualalai Coffee Company.  The Club Concierge is on hand to help you with any bookings or arrangements. An additional swimming pool is conveniently located directly across from this villa - perfect for an end-of-day dip. Also available for your exclusive use is a 4-person golf cart. Take a spin through more than 800 acres of lush tropical landscaping surrounding fields of jet-black lava, or visit the Residents’ Beach House for lunch. This villa will leave you with lasting and fond memories of your Hualalai experience.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Indonesia’s ‘Island of Love’ is indisputably one the Earth’s most fascinating places, renowned for its sophisticated culture of arts, excellent surfing opportunities, ancient sacred temples and dazzling tropical scenery. Windu Estate can offer up to twelve Bali-bound travelers opulent accommodations with ten plush guest suites amid an estate replete with creature comforts. Located in Petitenget, Windu Estate is conveniently located in between high-end shopping, spas, restaurants, beaches, scenic mountain trails and totally immersed in the fascinating culture of Bali.

Start each day at the Windu Estate with a freshly prepared breakfast by the on-site gourmet chef who works with the estate’s butler and housekeeper to attend to guests’ every need. A forty-five foot swimming pool provides ample space to cool off and have a splash, not far from a chic alfresco dining area for meals to be had in the great tropical outdoors. Additionally, the home lacks for nothing when it comes to modern technology, with cutting-edge entertainment units and Wi-Fi found throughout the home.

The decor found here is both romantic and grandiose, featuring glamorous white stone colonnades, marble and wooden floors and stained-glass side windows all inspired from the elegant era belonging to the turn of the twentieth century. Shared meals are always a special occasion and will be an especially refined experience set on a grand dining table, comfortably seating twelve. The gourmet kitchen comes fully equipped with all appliances and boasts both style and utility.

Windu Estate features seven master bedrooms out of ten spread over two separate residences. Bed options range from four-poster king size to super king size and double beds. Each room additionally boasts en-suite bathrooms, entertainment technology and access to balconies. The fluid and open design of Windu Estate brings the concept of indoor/outdoor living to a crescendo.

Petitenget is located on the periphery of the bustling Seminyak district, so guests can choose to either participate in the lively nightlife found there or retreat to the peaceful grounds of Windu Estate on a dime. Aside from the spiritualism and natural beauty of Bali, gastronomy is also revered here with plenty of luxurious local and international restaurants geared to suit anyone’s taste. After a sumptuous meal, join the elite crowd at any one of Seminyak’s stylish beach clubs for the drinks, laughter and dazzling ocean views.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Experience the famously warm Bali weather and hospitality at the gorgeous Villa Nehal. This Badung-area vacation rental is just a short drive from several great beaches, trendy restaurants and family-friendly attractions, but feels like a private oasis. Let the five bedrooms and attentive staff welcome you in a group of up to ten friends.

During your holiday, a breakfast cook, housekeeper and gardener will see to your needs. Since the villa is set in a quieter area where rice fields still abound, it’s peaceful in the courtyard around the swimming pool and al-fresco lounging and dining areas. In the evenings, enjoy the TV, sound system and Wi-Fi. For your comfort and convenience, the villa has air conditioning and laundry facilities.

Wall-to-wall glass doors, which can be folded away, are all that separates the outdoor living areas from the villa’s great room. A stone floor and wood-paneled vaulted ceiling add natural texture to the spacious sitting and dining areas, and a breakfast bar connects the great room to the stylish modern kitchen, which is fully equipped.

There are three bedrooms in the main house of this luxury property and two in a guest house that offers honeymoon-style privacy to a couple or separate accommodations for teens. All five bedrooms have king beds, en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, and open to a balcony or terrace.

Though it feels like a world away from the ordinary, Villa Nehal’s setting in Umalas Tegal Cupek puts you about a 5-minute drive from some of the most popular Seminyak beaches and hottest beach clubs, as well as must-try eateries and tempting boutiques. Splash around at the Waterbom Bali Waterslides in Kuta, a short drive away, or indulge yourself with a massage or treatment at one of several nearby spas.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note that this property is in close proximity to a construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

An intoxicating sense of Balinese splendour runs through this palatial beachside manor. Guests can expect another level of comfort, with local culture flavoring the stunning decor. As morning breaks, gaze from bedroom balconies to the pool deck below, and explore grand hallways, spacious recreation spaces and an imperial kitchen / dining area. Fine beaches plus Cangu’s local delights are nearby.

As morning sunlight flows through the windows of Villa Indrani, guests can appreciate the true beauty of this property. Stone ornaments and rich wooden surfaces abound through the villa, with breakfast being provided by the on-site chef via the beautifully-equipped kitchen. Get the day started right with a swim in the impressive pool, which is overlooked by a stunning example of bleached-wood art. The quality and taste behind the fixtures of the villa are clearly evident, and guests will appreciate the dark stone and cooling aspects of the property’s bathroom after a long day on one of the many nearby beaches. As evening draws in, wander the impressive, open corridors to take up a dream reading spot in the poolside recliners, as the scent of a gently cooking meal, made with fresh Balinese ingredients, drifts out along the well-maintained terrace.

From Villa Indrani, guests have great access to the sunlit lanes, green fields, and most importantly, excellent beaches of this section of the Bali coast. Ideal for those keen on swimming and sunbathing, nearby Berawa Beach is ideal for those keen to take to the water, or even get their first surfing lessons. A short drive will also bring guests to the buzzing town of Seminyak, famous for its dining and shopping options, which makes a fine contrast to the quiet countryside in the villa’s vicinity.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Take in a magnificent Victoria sunset from the shores of Lake Connewarre from this premium, lakeside mansion. Baroque style runs throughout this stately home, with broad, lake-facing windows and white pillars. Walk groomed pathways to the home’s sculpted garden. Graceful, bright interiors characterize the living areas, with golf, beaches, wine country and Geelong town nearby.

The lengthy expanse of Campbell Point House’s driveway gives a hint to new arrivals of the level of style and elegance to expect. This property ensures that groups can occupy the wings that best suit them, with full equipped apartments in the main house, lake house, cottage and stables. The home features a level of intricate design and craftsmanship more common to centuries past, with the style of the living rooms, a sheltered terrace, and a formal dining area capable of comfortably seating dozens of guests. Overhead windows and broad hallways ensure a regal experience, with grand bedrooms to match. 

From the grounds of Campbell Point House, take in the natural beauty of the Lake Connewarre area as well as nearby sights and tastes. Wading birds and parrots dot the shoreline, with the golden sands and blue water of Ocean Grove Beach a short drive away. To the east, guests can visit the excellent bars, restaurants and cafes of Geelong, or cast off for a refreshing Port Phillip bay cruise. To the west, the Bellarine Penninsula’s many excellent wineries are well worth a visit, before returning to the villa for a delicious evening meal, provided each night.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The indoors and out meet seamlessly at Hale Hoaloha. And the outdoors are spectacular, with views of Mauna Kea, the ocean and even Maui in the distance. Built between two top-tier hotels on the grounds of the Mauna Lani Resort, this luxury vacation rental offers guests access to the amenities of both. You’ll enjoy resort-worthy views in a private setting for a family reunion, destination wedding or whatever else you want to celebrate.

Step through the villa’s classic stone courtyard and into your own private tropical paradise. Pocket glass doors open the house to an expansive lanai with sitting and dining areas, an outdoor kitchen with a gas barbecue and plenty of loungers grouped around an infinity pool and hot tub. Let the Big Island breeze lull you to sleep in the hammock, or gather around the firepit for some incredible stargazing in the night sky over the world’s most remote island chain.

More than 5,500 square feet of beautifully appointed living space lets you truly relax at Hale Hoaloha. The open-plan interiors are a mix of traditional Hawaiian style and modern touches, from the vaulted ceilings, quartzite floors and warm Ohia wood and mahogany finishes to the sleek sofas and sculptural accent tables. A thoughtful floor plan makes it easy to entertain, with a wet bar adjoining the living room and a window-lined formal dining area just off the fully equipped kitchen.

Each of the villa’s five bedrooms has an ensuite bathroom and opens to a terrace. A king bed, alfresco shower, jetted tub and private terrace make the master bedroom just as plush as any honeymoon suite. There are two other bedrooms with king beds, one with a queen bed and one with two queen and twin bunk beds, so the property can easily accommodate groups of friends, couples, or families traveling with children.

With the Fairmont Orchid Hotel on one side of Hale Hoaloha and Mauna Lani Bay Hotel on the other, you’ll never want for activities. Walk to the white sands of the exclusive Pauoa Beach Club at the Fairmont for sunbathing, swimming and oceanfront bars and restaurants. Or take the golf cart included in your holiday to Mauna Lani, which has its own stretch of beach, a gourmet grocery, tennis, 36 holes of championship golf and more.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Stay in a contemporary masterpiece less than a quarter-mile from famed Bondi Beach at Wallis St. Sleek, bright and beautifully designed, this incredible vacation rental makes a stylish setting for a beach getaway or a holiday spent exploring the must-sees of Sydney. Its four bedrooms mean you can invite a group of up to eight friends or family along.

On sunny days, bring a book out to the private courtyard and relax in a lounger on the terrace or splash in the heated pool and hot tub. In the evenings, climb the stairs to the deck and heat up the barbecue for a meal at the alfresco table. Or unwind inside with the help of amenities from a home theater and wet bar to a games room with pool and foosball tables.

Clean lines, neutral tones and an open-concept layout give the interiors of Wallis St a look of pared-down chic. Pale wood floors and matching wall panels link the sitting area to the adjacent fully equipped kitchen, where the dining area is built right into the stone countertops.

This luxury property boasts a honeymoon-worthy master suite with a king bed, ensuite bathroom, balcony and views of both ocean and city. There are also two bedrooms with queen beds and ensuite bathrooms, and one bedroom with a queen bed and shared bathroom. Like the rest of the house, the bedrooms have air conditioning and ceiling fans.

But the villa’s best feature might just be its location: a 6-minute walk from Bondi Beach and less than a quarter-mile from the Bondi to Bronte walk, the North Bondi children’s pool and the Bondi golf course. Lie out on the white sand, swim on the gentler north end or walk to the south end of the beach to watch surfers fly along the waves.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Immerse yourself in the Bali landscape at Villa Nedine. Outside, palm trees and flowering shrubs surround the villa; inside, this thoughtfully designed modern residence embodies eco-friendly luxury with its use of recycled materials from the island in its furnishings. Take advantage of its Canggu location to walk the 100 meters to Echo Beach, browse local boutiques or try nearby restaurants.

 

Your holiday at Villa Nedine includes the services of a butler, housekeeper and villa manager; while they take care of the details, you can be doing laps in the pool or finishing a juicy mystery in a lounger in the sun. In the evenings, watch family-favorite movies on the projector, have an impromptu dance party thanks to the integrated sound system or catch up on your feeds via Wi-Fi.

 

The villa’s ultra modern glass walls and open-concept layout are balanced by warm wood accents and bamboo furnishings. There’s room for everyone on the pair of sofas in the living room or around the dining table for 10, and even the fully equipped kitchen has plenty of seating at the breakfast bar.

 

This vacation rental can accommodate parties of up to 8 guests in 3 bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with a queen bed. All 4 bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms; 2 of them are honeymoon-suite-worthy al-fresco bathrooms, which let you shower under the stars.

 

A location in Kuta Utara means Villa Nedine is just a 4-minute walk from Echo Beach and a 6-minute drive from Nelayan and Canggu/Batu Bolong beaches. It’s also within walking distance of the restaurants, bars and shops in Canggu, where you can stop for a coffee or spend hours looking for the perfect souvenir. For a memorable night out, head to nearby Finns Beach Club; for an only-in-Bali experience, visit Tanah Lot Sea Temple.

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Embrace your wild side at this breezy beachfront estate in Bali. Wander grounds decorated with mature palms, lush gardens, and scenic ocean lookouts. Stretch out in a sun lounger and work on your tan from the cantilevered-deck. Then, follow steps down to your own slice of sandy beach. Later, drive 3-minutes to Pererenan for dinner at one of the town’s beachfront restaurants.  

Balinese architecture makes a point of incorporating natural surroundings, which is exceptionally luxurious when the property is right on the beach. Wake up each morning to fragrant gardens and cool sea breeze. Sip your morning coffee amongst earthy, wood adorned interiors decorated with Balinese art and designer furnishings. And, dine beneath chandelier lights next to the fully equipped kitchen. 

After dinner, throw a movie on the projector screen for the kids and mix yourself a tropical cocktail to enjoy on the rooftop lounge. Refresh with a quick hop in the pool. When it cools off at night, do some stargazing from the hot tub. In the morning, start your day with a trip to the home gym and a few minutes in the sauna. For lunch, grill up something fresh on the barbecue. 

Start your Balinese exploration at Tanah Lot, the island’s most iconic temple. Built on an ancient rock formation in the sea, Tanah Lot’s crashing waves and sunset views make for incredible vacation pictures. Later that night, hit the beachfront party scene at Finn’s Recreation Club, home to several beach bars, oceanfront restaurants, and bustling night clubs.  

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Ke Alaula is a beautiful villa in Kailua Kona on Hawaii's Big Island. Located within the Four Seasons Hualalai, this stunning vacation rental offers proximity to world-class resort amenities along with the exquisite privacy and comforts of a luxury home. With three bedrooms, spectacular ocean views, and superb indoor and outdoor spaces, Ke Alaula is ideal for family getaways, golfcations, and destination wedding guests.

Surrounded by beautifully landscaped gardens and lawns, Ke Alaula's multiple patios and verandas boast expansive views of the Pacific Ocean and the Four Seasons golf course. Savor local Kona coffee in the lanai, relaxing on elegant loungers and gazing out on the gardens and sea. Fire up the grill for a delicious afternoon barbecue of local fare, and relish it at the alfresco table.

From the lanai, expansive glass doors open to the stunning interior Great Room. Under vaulted ceilings, enjoy cocktails in the sumptuous lounge and watch your favorite movies on the 55-inch TV. Prepare meals in the fully equipped kitchen and enjoy them around the elegant dining table. The decor of the Great Room is superb, with wicker and wooden furnishings, woven lauhala ceilings, and a beautiful color palette that soothes the spirit and echoes the island's precious natural beauty.

The main floor also includes one bedroom, with a king bed, access to the balcony, and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower. At ground level, the deluxe master bedroom features a beautiful king bed, private lanai with lounge furniture, ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and large stand-alone tub, and alfresco shower. The ground-floor guest bedroom has a queen bed, shared access to the hall bathroom, and direct access to the terrace. This floor also features a media room with comfortable furniture, flat-screen TV, and wide doors to the outdoor garden and lanai, as well as a peaceful office space.

Ke Alaula is wonderfully located for enjoying and exploring the Big Island. You're just a fifteen-minute walk from the Four Seasons Hualalai Beach, or a short ride in the complementary 4-seater golf cart. Hapuna Beach and Kahaluu Beach are an easy drive away. For golf, Mauni Lani and Mauna Kea are close by. At extra cost, enjoy the award-winning amenities of the Four Seasons resort.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Light spilling through a corrugated roof mimics the look of sunshine slotting between bamboo stalks in the garden of this modern townhouse in eastern Sydney. Its sleek, black-and-white interiors are brightened both by natural light and by colorful artwork. People-watch from an outdoor café along Woollahra’s Queen Street, steps away, and along the sandy crescent of Bondi Beach, 10 minutes by car.

Your holiday at this vacation rental begins with a personal welcome and a gourmet basket. Nibble on the treats in the loungers in the front garden, and entertain friends and family around the wet bar, wine fridge, gas barbecue, and alfresco lounging and dining areas in the back garden. If you’ve spent the day exploring the city, spend the evening unwinding in front of the smart streaming TV, Sonos sound system, and Wi-Fi.

Contemporary design is on display throughout this luxury property. A sea-blue ottoman and sleek black TV wall anchor the living room at the front of the house. Follow the steps down to the open-concept dining room and fully equipped kitchen, where dark cabinetry meets its equal in drama in a metallic countertop.

The villa has one master bedroom with a king bed and private ensuite bathroom, and a second bedroom with a queen bed and access to a hall bathroom. For larger parties, there’s also a twin daybed in the office space.

During your stay, you’re only steps from Queen Street in downtown Woollahra, where buttery scents from the neighborhood patisseries fill the air by day and the outdoor Moonlight Cinema lights up the night. Drive 10 minutes to some of Australia’s most iconic sights, like the Sydney Opera House and Harbour Bridge, or take a honeymoon from the everyday on the white sands and local-favorite surf break of Bondi Beach, also 10 minutes away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
With its spacious Main House and six bedrooms, all of which open to the terrace, this Balinese rental feels more like a boutique resort, but Villa Naty is all yours. Inside Naty’s gated walls, you’ll enjoy immaculate tropical gardens and a serene atmosphere that is sure to melt stress away in an instant. Outside of Villa Naty’s estate, you’ll find yourself immersed in Balinese culture, situated amongst the traditional rice paddies and rolling hills on the outskirts of Seminyak. And, Villa Naty is just five kilometers from several public beaches and beach clubs.

Villa Naty’s soothing white walls are decorated with Balinese art. Underneath high vaulted ceilings, you’ll find rich wood tones on flooring, furniture, and trim work. Throughout the open-air estate, you’ll feel at one with nature, thanks to Naty’s tropical gardens, water features, and numerous openings to the terrace.

You may not notice at first, thanks to careful design, but Villa Naty is well-equipped with state of the art tech features, like Smart TVs, a media room, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth sound system, air conditioning, an exercise room, and a top of the line kitchen. On the terrace, you’ll love the relaxing hot tub, swimming pool, and lounge spaces. At Villa Naty, outdoor dining is a must. You can even prepare meals outside in the alfresco kitchen, which comes with a wood oven and a barbecue. And, the villa is staffed with a butler, housekeeper, chef, and security guard.

If you’re in the mood to shop for souvenirs, dine at some of Bali’s most famous restaurants, or enjoy a day at the spa, Seminyak Square is the place to be. Just five kilometers from home, you’ll have no trouble enjoying downtown Seminyak’s beautiful environment and vibrant nightlife. If you’re traveling with children, Waterborn Bali waterpark in Kuta or Elephant Safari Park in Taro are both great afternoon excursions. And, when it’s time to head to the beach, you’ll find Seminyak, Echo, and Batubelig beaches, all within six kilometers of Villa Naty.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
